languages.text: "Последний шанс, Каллигос. Разруби {mf|этого|эту} выскочку на кусочки топором, что я для тебя благословил. Освежуй, умойся кровью... Мы обо всем забудем и двинемся дальше — охотиться и убивать. Этим же ты предпочитаешь заглушать скуку и одиночество?"

traits.locale_text: "Последний шанс, Каллигос. Разруби {mf|этого|эту} выскочку на кусочки топором, что я для тебя благословил. Освежуй, умойся кровью... Мы обо всем забудем и двинемся дальше — охотиться и убивать. Этим же ты предпочитаешь заглушать скуку и одиночество?"
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Archmilitant

languages.text: "This is your last chance, Calligos. Cleave this upstart in two with the axe that I blessed for you. Skin {mf|him|her} and bathe in {mf|his|her} blood. We will forget everything and continue on our journey — to hunt and to kill. This is the way you prefer to drown out your loneliness and boredom, is it not?"
languages.original_text: "Последний шанс, Каллигос. Разруби {mf|этого|эту} выскочку на кусочки топором, что я для тебя благословил. Освежуй, умойся кровью... Мы обо всем забудем и двинемся дальше — охотиться и убивать. Этим же ты предпочитаешь заглушать скуку и одиночество?"

traits.locale_text: "This is your last chance, Calligos. Slice this upstart in two with the axe that I blessed for you. Skin and bathe in mf|his|her} blood... We will forget everything and continue on our journey — to hunt and to kill. This is the way you prefer to drown out your own loneliness and boredom, isn't it?"
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Archmilitant

We will forget everything and continue on our journey — to hunt and to kill. This is the way you prefer to drown out your loneliness and boredom, isn't it?"

traits.locale_text: "This is your last chance, Calligos. Cleave this upstart in two with the axe that I blessed for you. Skin {mf|him|her} and bathe in {mf|his|her} blood. We will forget everything and continue on our journey — to hunt and to kill. This is the way you prefer to drown out your loneliness and boredom, is it not?"
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Archmilitant

traits.locale_text: "This is your last chance, Calligos. Cleave this upstart in two with the axe that I blessed for you. Skin {mf|him|her} and bathe in {mf|his|her} blood. We will forget everything and continue on our journey — to hunt and to kill. This is the way you prefer to drown out your loneliness and boredom, is it not?"
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Archmilitant

languages.text: «Esta es tu última oportunidad, Calligos. Parte en dos a {mf|este advenedizo|esta advenediza} con el hacha que bendije para ti. Arráncale la piel a tiras y báñate en su sangre... Olvidaremos lo sucedido y continuaremos nuestro viaje, cazando y matando. ¿No es así como prefieres combatir el tedio y la soledad de tu existencia?».
languages.original_text: "This is your last chance, Calligos. Cleave this upstart in two with the axe that I blessed for you. Skin {mf|him|her} and bathe in {mf|his|her} blood. We will forget everything and continue on our journey — to hunt and to kill. This is the way you prefer to drown out your loneliness and boredom, is it not?"

traits.locale_text: «Esta es tu última oportunidad, Calligos. Parte en dos a {mf|este advenedizo|esta advenediza} con el hacha que bendije para ti. Arráncale la piel a tiras y báñate en su sangre... Olvidaremos lo sucedido y continuaremos nuestro viaje, cazando y matando. ¿No es así como prefieres combatir el tedio y la soledad de tu existencia?».
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Archmilitant

languages.text: “这是你最后的机会了，卡里戈斯。用我赐予你的斧头，把这个新来的劈成两半，剥掉{mf|他的|她的}皮，浸淫在鲜血之中吧……这样，我们就可以忘记一切，继续我们的旅程了。狩猎与杀戮，你最喜欢用这种方式来消磨你的孤独与无聊，不是吗？”
languages.original_text: "This is your last chance, Calligos. Cleave this upstart in two with the axe that I blessed for you. Skin {mf|him|her} and bathe in {mf|his|her} blood. We will forget everything and continue on our journey — to hunt and to kill. This is the way you prefer to drown out your loneliness and boredom, is it not?"

traits.locale_text: “这是你最后的机会了，卡里戈斯。用我赐予你的斧头，把这个新来的劈成两半，剥掉{mf|他的|她的}皮，浸淫在鲜血之中吧……这样，我们就可以忘记一切，继续我们的旅程了。狩猎与杀戮，你最喜欢用这种方式来消磨你的孤独与无聊，不是吗？”
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Archmilitant

languages.text: « C'est votre dernière chance, Calligos. Fendez {mf|cet|cette} arriviste en deux avec la hache que j'ai bénie pour vous. Écorchez-{mf|le|la} et baignez-vous dans son sang... Ensuite, nous oublierons tout ça et reprendrons notre chasse. C'est bien comme ça que vous aimez tromper votre solitude et votre ennui, n'est-ce pas ? »
languages.original_text: "This is your last chance, Calligos. Cleave this upstart in two with the axe that I blessed for you. Skin {mf|him|her} and bathe in {mf|his|her} blood. We will forget everything and continue on our journey — to hunt and to kill. This is the way you prefer to drown out your loneliness and boredom, is it not?"

traits.locale_text: « C'est votre dernière chance, Calligos. Fendez {mf|cet|cette} arriviste en deux avec la hache que j'ai bénie pour vous. Écorchez-{mf|le|la} et baignez-vous dans son sang... Ensuite, nous oublierons tout ça et reprendrons notre chasse. C'est bien comme ça que vous aimez tromper votre solitude et votre ennui, n'est-ce pas ? »
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Archmilitant

languages.text: 「これが最後のチャンスだ、カリゴス。俺が祝福した斧で、この成り上がり者を真っ二つに切り刻め。奴の皮を剥ぎ、その血を浴びろ。すべてを忘れ、旅を続けるのだ…狩りと殺しのために。これがお前の孤独と退屈を紛らわす方法なんだろ？」
languages.original_text: "This is your last chance, Calligos. Cleave this upstart in two with the axe that I blessed for you. Skin {mf|him|her} and bathe in {mf|his|her} blood. We will forget everything and continue on our journey — to hunt and to kill. This is the way you prefer to drown out your loneliness and boredom, is it not?"

traits.locale_text: 「これが最後のチャンスだ、カリゴス。俺が祝福した斧で、この成り上がり者を真っ二つに切り刻め。皮を剥ぎ、その血を浴びろ。すべてを忘れ、旅を続けるのだ…狩りと殺しのために。これがお前の孤独と退屈を紛らわす方法なんだろ？」
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Archmilitant

languages.text: "Das ist Eure letzte Chance, Calligos. Spaltet diesen Emporkömmling mit der Axt, die ich für Euch gesegnet habe, in zwei Hälften. Häutet {mf|ihn und badet in seinem|sie und badet in ihrem} Blut ... Wir vergessen alles und setzen unsere Reise fort ... wir jagen und wir töten. So betäubt Ihr doch am liebsten Eure Einsamkeit und Langeweile, nicht wahr?"
languages.original_text: "This is your last chance, Calligos. Cleave this upstart in two with the axe that I blessed for you. Skin {mf|him|her} and bathe in {mf|his|her} blood. We will forget everything and continue on our journey — to hunt and to kill. This is the way you prefer to drown out your loneliness and boredom, is it not?"

traits.locale_text: "Das ist Eure letzte Chance, Calligos. Spaltet diesen Emporkömmling mit der Axt, die ich für Euch gesegnet habe, in zwei Hälften. Häutet {mf|ihn und badet in seinem|sie und badet in ihrem} Blut ... Wir vergessen alles und setzen unsere Reise fort ... wir jagen und wir töten. So betäubt Ihr doch am liebsten Eure Einsamkeit und Langeweile, nicht wahr?"
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Archmilitant

languages.text: "Bu senin son şansın Calligos. Sana bahşettiğim baltayla şu görgüsüzü ikiye ayır. Onun derisini yüz ve kanında yıkan. Her şeyi unutup yolculuğumuza, avlanıp öldürmeye devam edeceğiz. Yalnızlığını ve can sıkıntını bastırmak için tercih ettiğin yol bu değil miydi?"
languages.original_text: "This is your last chance, Calligos. Cleave this upstart in two with the axe that I blessed for you. Skin {mf|him|her} and bathe in {mf|his|her} blood. We will forget everything and continue on our journey — to hunt and to kill. This is the way you prefer to drown out your loneliness and boredom, is it not?"
